The tender offer is expected to expire on August 5, 2015.7 Aug 15 - Dividend Capital Diversified Property Fund has announced the preliminary results of the tender offer. Based on the preliminary count, a total of 17,350,442 shares were tendered at the final purchase price of $7.25, for an aggregate deal value of $125.8m.The final results will be announced following the confirmation by the depositary agent.

6 Jul 15 - National Bank Holdings Corp, a US based provider of commercial banking services, has made a tender offer to repurchase up to $100m of its own shares corresponding to 14.55% of its issued share capital. The shares will be repurchased through a modified "Dutch auction" tender offer at a price per share not less than $19.60 and not greater than $22.50. The tender offer is expected to expire on July 31, 2015.3 Aug 15 - The transaction has been completed.

Wendy's Co, a US quick service restaurant company has made a tender offer to repurchase 55.8m of its own shares corresponding to 15.3% of its issued share capital.The consideration is $639m based on a given offer price of $11.45 per share.8 Jul 15 - The transaction has been completed.

AAR Corp stockholders may tender all or a portion of their shares at a price specified by the tendering stockholder of not less than $29 per share and not more than $32 per share.The tender offer and withdrawal rights will expire at the end of the day, 12:00 midnight Eastern Standard Time on May 22, 2015, unless extended or terminated by AAR.26 May 15- This transaction has been completed. AAR Corp has repurchased 4.2m shares at the price of $31.90 per share.

21 Apr 15 - Celestica Inc, a Canadian provider of electronics manufacturing services to original equipment manufacturers worldwide has announced its intention to repurchase for cancellation up to $350m of its shares. 27 Apr 15 - Celestica has announced the terms of its buyback program under which it will offer to purchase up to 29,914,529 shares for a price not to exceed $350m. The offer will be conducted through a "modified Dutch auction" within a price range of not less than US$11.70 per share and not more than US$13.30 per share.The offer will expire at 5 p.m. Eastern time on June 1, 2015, unless terminated or extended by Celestica.5 Jun 15 - Celestica has completed the repurchase of 26,315,789 shares at a price of $13.30 per share. Total deal value is $350m.

23 Feb 15 - Fidelity National Financial Ventures LLC, a US based investment management firm, has announced the authorization to repurchase up to $185m in its own common stock at a price range between $14.30 and $15.40 per share through a modified Dutch auction tender offer. 23 Mar 15 - Fidelity National Financial Ventures LLC, a US based investment management firm, has repurchased 13.347% interest in its own common stock, or 12.33m shares.Consideration for the deal was $184.99m based on its offer price of $15 per share.

7 Jan 15 - EXFO Inc, a Canadian manufacturer of fiber-optic test, measurement and monitoring instruments, has authorized the repurchase of up to C$30m ($25.5m) of its outstanding shares by way of a modified dutch auction tender offer at a price not less than C$4.20 per share and not more than C$4.60 per share. The Offer will expire at 5 p.m. EST on February 13, 2015, unless withdrawn, extended or varied by EXFO.20 Feb 15 - The repurchase has been completed.

29 Oct 14 - MCG Capital Corp, a US based financial services company, has anounced it will commence a modified "Dutch Auction" tender offer for up to $75m of its common shares at a price per share not less than $3.25 and not greater than $3.75. The maximum number of shares proposed to be purchased in the tender offer represents approximately 53.0% of MCG Capital Corp’s currently outstanding common stock.The tender offer is expected to expire on December 3, 2014.04 ec 14- MCG Capital Corp has successfully tendered 4.996m of its shares. Consideration for the deal was $18.7m.

German real estate management company, TAG Immobilien AG, has made a tender offer to repurchase up to 13,129,831 own shares corresponding to 10% of its issued share capital.The consideration is Eur109.63m ($141.73m), based on the offer price of Eur8.35 per share.23 Oct 2014 - The transaction has been completed.

06 Mar 14 – Genpact Ltd, a listed Indian provider of management consulting services, announced that it will repurchase up to $300m worth of its own shares through tender offer. At the minimum share price of $16.5 per share, it can repurchase up to 18,181,818 shares, or 7.85% stake. The offer will end on Apr 2, 2014.03 Apr 14 - Deal completed. Genpact announced that it will accept to repurchase 17,331,693 shares, or 7.48% stake, at $17.50 per share. The consideration is $303.3m.

21 Feb 14 - A US-based holding company for Central Pacific Bank, Central Pacific Financial Corp, has announced a tender offer to repurchase up to $68.8m worth of stock.24 Mar 14 - 3,369,850 common shares of Central Pacific were tendered at $20.20 per share, valuing the transaction at $68.07m, and representing approximately 8% of the issued share capital.

7 Feb 14 - Outerwall Inc, a US based operator of automated, video rental and self-service coin counting and processing machines, has made a tender offer to repurchase up to $350m in a modified Dutch Auction.Under the terms of the tender offer, Outerwall's stockholders will have the opportunity to tender some or all of their shares at a price per share of not less than $66.82 and not greater than $76.32.Based on the minimum price of $66.82 per share, Outerwall may repurchase up to 20.6% of its outstanding common stock.13 Mar 14 - Outerwall Inc has repurchased 5.2917m ordinary shares at a price of $70.01 per share, for a total of $370.4720m.

31 Jan 14 - STR Holdings Inc, a US based solar power module encapsulant manufacturer, has made a tender offer to repurchase of up to $30m of its shares in a modified dutch auction, at a price of $1.00 - $1.54 per share.The company may acquire up to 30m ordinary shares, or 71.6% of its outstanding shares, based on the minimum purchase price of $1.00 per share. The tender offer expires on February 28, 2014.18 Feb 14 - STR Holdings has amended the terms of its modified dutch auction.The company has increased the offer price to between $1.35 - $1.54 and now may acquire up to 22.2m ordinary shares, or 53% of its outstanding shares, based on the minimum purchase price of $1.35 per share.DLJ Merchant Banking Partners has announced it intended to tender all or portion of the STR shares.The expiration date for the tender offer has been extended and now expires on March 3rd, 20144 Mar 14 - STR Holdings has repurchased approximately 15.6641m shares, or 37.4% of its outstanding shares, at a price of $1.54 per share, valuing the transaction at $24.1227m.

14 Jan 14 - Wendy's Co, a US based quick service restaurant company, has made a modified Dutch Auction Tender offer to repurchase 29.7m shares, representing 7.5% of its issued share capital.The consideration is $275m. 11 Feb 14 - Preliminary results announced. 19 Feb 14 - Transaction has completed.

31 Oct 2013 - Lifevantage Corp, a US based manufacturer of health and wellness products, has repurchased 16,326,530 shares of its common stock, or a 13.9% stake, at $2.45 per share. The consideration was $40m.

10 Oct 13 - Columbia Property Trust Inc, a US based commercial real estate company, has commenced a Dutch auction to repurchase up to 2.5391%, or $300m, of its common stock. 15 Aug 2013 - Cole Real Estate Investments, a US based provider of real estate investment products, has repurchased 20,408,163 shares of its common stock, or a 4.1666% stake. The consideration was $12.25 per share, or $250m in total.

21 Feb 12 - Hackett Group Inc, a US-based strategic advisory firm providing best practice advisory, benchmarking, and transformation consulting services, has commenced a modified Dutch Auction tender offer to acquire up to $55m of its common stock at a price not greater than $5.00 nor less than $4.25 per share.22 Mar 12 - Hackett Group Inc has announced the preliminary results of its modified Dutch auction tender offer, which expired on, March 21, 2012. 25 Jul 13 - Halliburton Co, a US based provider of diversified energy and construction services has announced its intention to purchase up to $3.3bn in a modified “Dutch Auction” tender. 22 Aug 13 – Deal is complete. Halliburton has acquired 68m shares at a price of $48.50 per share for a total deal value of $3.3bn.

17 Jun 2013 - Geeknet Inc, a US based provider of computers & software, has announced a Dutch auction tender offer to repurchase 400,000 of its outstanding shares, which represented a 6.0452% stake in the company. At $14 per share, the transaction value is $5.6m.The tender offer expires on 15 July 2013.

01 Apr 13 - Forrester Research Inc, US-based independent research firm, has commenced a modified "Dutch auction" tender offer to repurchase shares of its common stock up to an aggregate purchase price of $130m. Forrester Research Inc’s shareholders will have the opportunity to tender some or all of their shares at a price within the range of $32 to $36 per share. The tender offer will remain open for at least 20 business days.13 May 13 - Acquisition is complete. Forrester Research has acquired 2.11m shares at a price of $36 for a total value of $76m.

20 Feb 13 - HealthSouth Corp, a US-based company that provides outpatient surgery and rehabilitative healthcare services, has commenced a modified Dutch auction tender offer for up to $350m of its common stock at a price between $22.5 and $25.5 per share. Consideration is $232.55, at completion.

The offer expires on January 4, 2013.07 Jan 12 - Transaction has completed. Approximately 4.1144m shares or a 9.2956% stake were tendered at a purchase price of $1.50 per share, for a total consideration of $6.1716m.

The consideration is $10.9321m, valued at $5.38 per share.

19 Nov 12 - Silgan Holdings Inc, a US-based manufacturer of metal and plastic consumer goods packaging products, has commenced a modified Dutch Auction tender offer to purchase up to $250m of its common stock. At a price of $40.75 per share, Silgan will repurchase 6.13m shares, or an 8.9% stake.06 Feb 13 - Silgan announced the results of its modified Dutch Auction tender offer. Silgan acquired 5.5249m shares of its stock at a price of $45.25 per share for a total consideration osf $250m.

The consideration is $36.80m.The Company intends to commence the Offer on November 14, 2012 and expects it to expire on December 12, 2012, unless extended or withdrawn.13 Dec 12 - Deal is complete. Gamco has acquired 0.7259m shares for $50 for a total price of $36.29m.

13 Nov 12 - CIBL Inc, a US television broadcasting company has announced that its board of Directors has authorized a modified 'Dutch Auction' tender offer to acquire up to 7,000 at a price between $820 and $860 per share for a total value of between $5.74m and $6.02m.The offer is expected to expire on December 12, 2012.18 Dec 12 - CIBL announced the final results of its modified Dutch Auction tender offer. 2,460 shares were validly tendered and not properly withdrawn at or below the final purchase price of $860.00 per share. CIBL has accepted for purchase 2,460 shares at a purchase price of $860 for a total consideration of $2.12m.

The purchase price will be $3.25 to $3.5 per share, for a total deal value of $14m.24 Dec 12 - FBR & Co has completed the tender offer, accepting for purchase 0.1936m ordinary shares at a price of $3.50, for a total deal value of $0.6778m.

27 Aug 12- Canadian real estate company, has announced its plans to repurchased up to 9% of its outstanding share capital.Huntingdon has offered to pay no more than C$13.25 per share.Offer is expected to expire on 1 Oct 12.1 Oct 12- Huntingdon repurchased 1.1321m common shares for C$13.25, for the total consideration of C$15m ($15.12m).

Agrium anticipates that the Bid will commence in early September 2012 and be scheduled to be completed in mid-October 2012. At a price of $1.58 per share, the company will acquire 14.557m shares representing a 33.95% stake, and at a price of $1.72, the company wil acquire 13.372 shares representing a 31.1867% stake.The tender offer will expire at 12:00 midnight, at the end of the day, New York City time, on Monday, July 30, 2012, unless extended by the Company.31 Jul 12 - Based upon preliminary results, the Nabi Biopharmaceuticals expects to accept for payment an aggregate of 14.548m shares of its common stock at a price of $1.68 per share, for a total of $24.4 million.02 Aug 12 - This transaction has completed. Nabi Biopharmaceuticals has accepted 14.548m shares representing a 33.9291% stake at a purchase price of $1.68 per share for a final consideration of $24.4m.

column10: Varian Associates Incorporated (3.14 million common shares)
column43: On August 23, 1995, Varian Associates Inc announced that its board has authorized a dutch auction self tender offer to purchase up to 3 million shares of its common stock. Under the terms of the offer, Varian will invite shareholders to tender shares at prices between $51 and $58 per share, with the precise amount to be specified by the tendering stockholders. Varian will determine the single per-share price that will allow the firm to buyback 3 million shares based upon the number of shares tendered and the prices specified. On September 21, 1995, Varian announced the completion of the repurchase of 3 million shares of its common stock from its dutch auction self tender offer. Varian expects to purchase approximately 3.14 million shares at a price of $56.5 per share. On September 26, 1995, Varian announced that it has repurchased 3,135,492 shares of its common stock at $56.5 per share. Total transaction value is approximately $177.2 million.

column43: On aug. 8, 1995, American President cos. Ltd. Announced a utch auctionself tender offer for 4 million shares of its common stock.
